about_the_game:
Expand your city with Metros and Airports!

Metro & Planes is the first DLC for Highrise City and builds up on the successful formula to create realistic cities with complex economy structures. It will allow you to optimize your public transport systems and to increase your trading capacities.

The new airport adds a new way to trade resources and to increase the wealth of your cities. Use the all new metro system to optimize your public transport. The newly created metro uses a complex spline-based rail system which allows you to easily create complex metroline systems, to build even more realistic cities. Additionally the new additions to the public transport will further lower the way costs of your citizens, enabling them to travel even farer distances to their designated work place.
